eu.amidst.core.variables

Class Variables

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.core.variables.Variables
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Iterable<Variable>

    public class Variables
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Variable>, java.io.Serializable
    This class implements the interface Iterable. It handles and defines an Iterator over a collection of Variable.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
